reviewText: I will never get tired of watching this movie ..... Brings to mind real history at its best .... will watch it again & again .... Alan.

I saw this some years ago on video but had to vies it on a friend's set as it was recorded in slow play which my machine didn't have. I bought this thinking it was regular play ...but it wasn't! This was a real nuisance! Buyer beware!!
The video is excellent but the tape quality poor. There is a wear mark across the middle of the screen throughout the film.
